mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_id, s.store_id, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.capacity FROM tbl_schedule s
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reservation (user_id_res, customer_num, schedule_id, res_date) VALUES (#{userIdRes}, #{customerNum}, #{scheduleId}, #{resDate});
mapper.select: SELECT r.res_id, r.user_id_res, r.res_date, r.customer_num, r.schedule_id, s.store_name, s.store_sort FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_schedule sch ON r.schedule_id = sch.schedule_id JOIN tbl_store s ON sch.store_id = s.store_id WHERE r.res_id = #{resId}

SELECT r.res_id, r.user_id_res, r.res_date, r.customer_num, r.schedule_id, u.username as user_name_res SELECT r.res_id, r.user_id_res, r.res_date, r.customer_num, r.schedule_id FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_schedule sch ON r.schedule_id = sch.schedule_id WHERE sch.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY r.res_date DESC

SELECT r.res_id, r.user_id_res, r.res_date, r.customer_num, r.schedule_id, s.store_name, s.store_sort, u.nickname AS user_name FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_schedule sch ON r.schedule_id = sch.schedule_id JOIN tbl_user u ON r.user_id_res = u.id WHERE sch.store_id = #{storeId} AND (r.res_date >= CURRENT_DATE) ORDER BY r.res_date ASC
